content: for this square i used dk yarn and a 4mm hook but you can use any yarn or hook suitable for your project if you want to make this to fit in with a bamcal ^1 project please note that i have made this with the same yarn and hook as i do for the bamcal 12 inch squares which are designed for aran/worsted yarns this comes out for me at roughly the same smaller size as my bamcal 12 inch squares very slightly over 9 inches this pattern is available in uk and us terms please let me know if you have any problems with the pattern downloading opening reading making the square and if you spot any errors there are two versions of each - the full version includes round by round finished photos and stitch charts throughout both patterns there are stitch photos to accompany the instructions for each round ^1 bamcal is the crochet block a month cal and there is a new one for each year there are two 12 inch squares and one 6 inch square if worked in aran/worsted each month you will easily find them by searching the full name in groups search
